snippet: BENDAHAN--Maurice, died peacefully January 1. Loving husband of Yvette and father of Miriam and great uncle. Funeral Sunday, January 3, 9:30am, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave at 91st St, New York. Interment at Beth Olam Cemetery in Ridgewood, Queens. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BENDAHAN--Maurice, died peacefully January 1. Loving husband of Yvette and father of Miriam and great uncle. Funeral Sunday, January 3, 9:30am, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave at 91st St, New York. Interment at Beth Olam Cemetery in Ridgewood, Queens. 1/3
